flexed 0.6.0

StyleGuide

bem grid utility variables

variables

$breakpoints variable

Default breakpoints.

$breakpoints: ( thin: 30em, normal: 48em, wide: 61.25em, full: 80em) !default;

$row-width variable

Default max-width for container mixin.

$row-width: 100% !default;

$gutter-width variable

Default gutter for column mixin.

$gutter-width: 10px !default;

$border-radius variable

Default radius for border-radius mixin.

$border-radius: 6px !default;

$border variable

Default border for border mixin.

$border: 1px solid #000 !default;

$colors variable

Default color map.

$colors: (
    b: (
        base: #00abde,
        darker: #007398,
        dark: #008bb8,
        light: #68cbf2,
        lighter: #bfefff
    ),
    g: (
        base: #70cf36,
        darker: #468222,
        dark: #549c29,
        light: #96d96e,
        lighter: #bee4a7
    ),
    r: (
        base: #ff9a55,
        darker: #e15b00,
        dark: #fb7419,
        light: #ffb480,
        lighter: #f7cfb3
    ),
    m: (
        base: #808080,
        darker: #242424,
        dark: #4d4d4d,
        light: #b3b3b3,
        lighter: #dfdfdf
    )
);

$z-index variable

Default z-index values.

$z-index: (
    bump: 10,
    dropdown: 100,
    overlay: 200,
    modal: 300,
    trump: 1000
);

$base-font-size variable

Default border for border mixin.

$base-font-size: 16px;
